Tests the Dojo Action "Call Effect". This is a logic function and requires the conditionals "Is Enemy" and "Is Friend" to work, as well as the action "Play Appearance". If the Call works, you will see a Shock played on the enemy targets and a glowy heal on friendlies.

Causes the player to meditate, regaining their health over 15 seconds. The player cannot move or attack during this period. Dark Meditation should be used when you are low on health, and not in immediate danger of combat.

Sunday! Sunday! SUNDAY! Watch as the Deathball 5000 makes mince meat out of your Nemesii. You will bowl your enemies over with death fresh out of the oven with the Deathbowl 5000!

You have learned how to be an unstoppable killing machine. This ability is the culmination of all your years of training. But, as the saying goes, slow and steady wins the race. Sit back in your lawn chair and take a long, deserved rest, for when you wake, all of your problems will be solved.

You've become addicted to both the Fishing Channel, and the History Chanel. Do you want to train to be a gladiator or a fisherman? Decisions, decisions... Well, now you can do both. Both fishermen and gladiators use nets to catch things. Well, here's a net, catch things!
After playing countless hours of Mortal Kombat, you have mastered Scorpion's "Get over HERE!" move. Girls may still not date you, but they don't have much of a choice now, do they?

You should not look at Happy Fun Ball 2000. You should not touch Happy Fun Ball 2000 in an unseemly manner. Do not feed Happy Funball 2000 after midnight. If Happy Fun Ball 2000 evicerates your cat, pretend that nothing has happened and move. Happy Fun Ball 2000 can lead to involuntary sheep licking. If Happy Fun Ball 2000 steals your identity, you will legally become Happy Funball 2000.

Are you near death? Do you feel downtrodden and out of breath? Then try this ability, and feel better about yourself, and about the poor hand that life has dealt you. This is euphoria in a bottle, utopia contained, and the first try is always free.

You've been studying the action sequences in B-rate comic books for years now. And, based on the onomatopoeia-laden panel by panel display of superhero moves, you believe, in your heart of hearts, that you know Karate Fu.

Just like Keanu Reeves in "The Matrix". This ability instantly bestows the knowledge of Kung Fu into your tiny little mind. You will kick and "HIYAAAAH!" with the best of them. So, go on Bruce Lee... Kick, Punch, it's all in the mind! Listen to me and soon you will find.. (<-- Parappa the Rapper reference.)

You've commited an Epic Fail, and now you're dead, and being corpse camped. Hmmm... what to do? What to do? How about trying out that new button on your death UI, the one that says, "Last Hurrah". Maybe that will do something. What do you think?

Rain down fire and immolation upon those whom have wronged you. Witness as their skin flakes away to ash, and their eyeballs melt into their skulls. You are the all-destroying cleanser of evil! BWAHAHAHAH!

You're a huge fan of Chris Angel. And the movie "Scanners". You firmly believe that magic is real, and that you can make peoples' heads explode with the power of your mind. And, it seems to work when you do it. So, after burying your mom and puppy, you have decided to show your cool new trick to the rest of the world.
Summons a cute little buddy that probes you deeply and intimately for 45 seconds.

Just put the spice in your mouth. As your tongue goes numb, and all the colors around you become more vibrant, you'll realize that you feel almost invincible. Nothing could possibly hurt you. Maybe now is the time to take up that lightsaber swallowing hobby that you've always wanted to try out.
Deploys a probe which burrows like a trapdoor spider beneath the ground, awaiting the moment to strike and violate an enemy with its probe, probably killing him / her in the process.

After watching countless hours of Dragonball Z, you have gained wisdom in the ways of fighting like Goku. This ability is your real life take on the classic anime distance punch. Your enemies will never be prepared for the SUPA Punch!

Although raised by two dopey farmers, you still retained the ambition of being able to fly like Superman. You shed your hick past and took to heart the line from Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy on how to fly, "Fall forward and forget to hit the ground". Now you can do this.

This ability is philisophical in nature. How long will one live? Death is always certain, but when will it come, and how? With this ability, your enemies never need ask these tough questions of themselves again. Death will come in the form of a dozen or so slow moving missiles.
You've got a a jetpack, why not use it to go WEEEEEE!

Fire this salvo of "Yo Mamma" jokes at your target until, unable to form a coherent comeback, they fall to the ground and curl up into a sobbing fetal position. Brutal victory and emotional scarring ensue.
Howdy, ya'll. Sup? Me? I'm just hangin out here in this xml file.
